title: My Goals : 2026 Goal Tracker Dashboard (7-card single-row)

requirements.summary: Create the "My Goals : 2026" dashboard page with a single horizontal row of 7 ordered, color-coded vertical goal cards matching the reference layout.
acceptanceCriteria: The page shows the title text "My Goals : 2026".
Seven cards render in a single left-to-right row in the specified order.
Each card has a distinct header/background color that clearly matches the requested color family (yellow/orange/red-salmon/pink/purple/blue/light green).
Overall layout is visually aligned with the uploaded reference image (card proportions, spacing, header style, and list-like goals presentation).

file_operations.description: Implement the dashboard UI including the title and the 7 required cards in the exact order and color scheme; structure the page to visually match the reference image (card proportions, spacing, header style, list-like presentation).
Wire the GoalsDashboard page into the app as the primary rendered view so it is reachable when the app loads.
Add global styles needed to support the dashboard’s layout fidelity (e.g., baseline page background/spacing) without modifying any files under frontend/src/components/ui.

requirements.summary: Load and apply the Lora font in italic to all card titles and all goal text on the dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Lora is loaded in the frontend and used for the dashboard typography.
All card titles are rendered using Lora italic.
All goal item text is rendered using Lora italic.

file_operations.description: Load the Lora font (including italic) in the document head so it is available to the dashboard typography.
Define a reusable CSS class (or utility composition) that applies Lora with italic styling, intended to be used by all card titles and goal text.
Apply the Lora italic typography styling to all card titles and all goal item text on the dashboard.

requirements.summary: Render each card’s goals as a vertical list with dashed separators between goal items.
acceptanceCriteria: Each card displays multiple goal items in a vertical list.
A dashed divider is visible between consecutive goal items (not just between header and first item).

file_operations.description: Implement per-card goal lists and add dashed separators between consecutive goal items (e.g., a dashed divider/border between list rows) consistent with the reference image.

requirements.summary: Add interactive checkbox-style controls for each goal item to toggle complete/incomplete state with immediate UI updates.
acceptanceCriteria: Each goal item has a clickable checkbox control.
Toggling a checkbox updates only that goal’s completed state in the UI without a full page refresh.
Completed vs incomplete goals are visually distinguishable (e.g., checkbox state and/or subtle text styling), while keeping the overall look consistent with the reference image.

file_operations.description: Add local UI state for goal completion and a checkbox-style control per goal that toggles completed/incomplete immediately with subtle, reference-consistent visual differentiation.

requirements.summary: Ensure cards stay on one non-wrapping row; disable horizontal scrolling at 7 or fewer cards and enable it only when more than 7 cards exist.
acceptanceCriteria: With exactly 7 cards, cards do not wrap and there is no horizontal scrollbar.
If the card count is increased beyond 7 (e.g., by adding an 8th card in data), horizontal overflow becomes scrollable so the additional card(s) can be reached.
The layout remains a single-row layout in both cases (no wrapping).

file_operations.description: Implement a single-row, no-wrap card container and conditionally toggle horizontal overflow behavior: hidden/disabled when card count <= 7 and scroll-enabled only when card count > 7.
Add any necessary global styles to ensure horizontal scrollbar is not shown when overflow is disabled and to keep the single-row layout consistent across common browsers.

requirements.summary: Add a "See goals per month" button at the end (right side) of the card row.
acceptanceCriteria: A button with exact text "See goals per month" appears after the last card in the row.
The button is reachable/visible in the row layout (and via horizontal scroll if card overflow is enabled).

file_operations.description: Add a button with the exact label "See goals per month" positioned after the 7th card within the same single-row container so it appears at the end/right side (and participates in conditional horizontal overflow behavior when applicable).
